details.title: Listen to your favourite music everywhere with Vodafone and Spotify.
details.text:
For just £9.99 per month and the first month is free (*). Click below to subscribe and add this to your plan.

No commitment, cancel anytime.
  • All your music on demand
  • Save music to listen offline
  • High quality listening
  • No ads

(*) This offer is only valid on your first subscription.

checkbox.label: I accept terms and conditions
checkbox.errorMessage: To continue, you must agree to the terms & conditions.

accordion.label: Info on Spotify Premium
accordion.text:
Premium

You get unlimited music from Spotify for the duration of your subscription.

Internet charges

You'll pay our standard internet charges to use this service when you're roaming or when you've exceeded your data allowance.

Stopping the offer

Please call Vodafone customer services if you want to cancel your subscription.

Spotify is supported by a wide range of mobile phones and home entertainment devices, including Android, Windows, Apple iOS, web and many more. Please note, it's not available on BlackBerry 10.

success.title: Great news! Your Spotify Premium account is set up and you're ready to go.
success.text:
All you need to do now is click below to download the Spotify app and log in using your username & password.

Or simply log in if you've already got it.
